name: Familiar Ground
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a unit adjacent to you.
- Target a hero in range who is adjacent to 3 or more obstacles.
_(You, other heroes, minions, tokens, and terrain are obstacles.)_

name: Home Turf
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a hero adjacent to you.
- Target a hero in range who is adjacent to 3 or more obstacles.
_(You, other heroes, minions, tokens, and terrain are obstacles.)_

name: Decoy
text:
**Choose up to two times,**, on different targets —
- Move an enemy minion in radius 1 space.
- Move an enemy hero in radius who is adjacent to 3 or more obstacles 1 spaces.

name: High Ground
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
If you target a hero adjacent to 3 or more obstacles, +2 ::attack_red:: attack.

name: Tread Lightly
text: Swap with either a unit adjacent to you, or with an enemy hero in radius who is adjacent to 3 or more obstacles.

name: Bear Trap
text:
**Choose one —**
- An enemy hero adjacent to you discards a card, if able.
- An enemy hero in radius who is adjacent to 3 or more obstacles discards a card, if able.

name: Elevated Ambush
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
If you target a hero adjacent to 3 or more obstacles, +2 ::attack_red:: attack.

name: Split Attack
text: Target a unit in range. If you target a hero who is adjacent to 3 or more obstacles, may repeat once on a different unit adjacent to you.

name: Log Trap
text:
**Choose one —**
- An enemy hero adjacent to you discards a card, if able.
- An enemy hero in radius who is adjacent to 3 or more obstacles discards a card, if able.

name: True Grit
text:
You may retrieve a discarded attack card.
If an enemy hero in radius is adjacent to 3 or more obstacles, move up to 3 spaces.

name: Cover Tracks
text:
Swap with either a unit adjacent to you, or with an enemy hero in radius who is adjacent to 3 or more obstacles.
You may move 1 space.

name: Mountain Guide
text: You may move a friendly unit, which is adjacent to you, up to 3 spaces. If an enemy hero in radius is adjacent to 3 or more obstacles, move a different friendly unit in radius up to 2 spaces.

name: Deadfall Trap
text:
**Choose one —**
- An enemy hero adjacent to you discards a card, or is defeated.
- An enemy hero in radius who is adjacent to 3 or more obstacles discards a card, or is defeated.

name: Die Hard
text:
You may retrieve a discarded attack card.
If an enemy hero in radius is adjacent to 3 or more obstacles, move up to 4 spaces.

name: Hide Traces
text:
Swap with either a unit adjacent to you, or with an enemy hero in radius who is adjacent to 3 or more obstacles.
Move up to 2 spaces.

name: Expedition Leader
text: You may move a friendly unit, which is adjacent to you, up to 3 spaces. If an enemy hero in radius is adjacent to 3 or more obstacles, move a different friendly unit in radius up to 3 spaces.

name: Peak Precision
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
If you target a hero adjacent to 3 or more obstacles, +2 ::attack_red:: attack and after the attack: You may retrieve this card.

name: Split Throw
text: Target a unit in range. If you target a hero who is adjacent to 3 or more obstacles, may repeat once on a different unit.

name: Over the Top
text: While you are performing actions, all enemy heroes in play count as being adjacent to 3 or more obstacles.
